players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "I find it strange that Diana was the one who was killed on the first night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and try to uncover any suspicious behavior."
Charlie: "Bob, I think you're right to be cautious. Let's focus on gathering information and making sure we don't make any rash decisions."

Bob: "I'd like to propose that we form an alliance, Alice and Charlie, to gather more information about each other and work together to uncover the mafia among us. Bob, you have shown good intuition and I believe we can trust you to help us in this investigation."

You: "I agree with Bob's suggestion of forming an alliance to gather more information and work together in this investigation. Let us all remain vigilant and trust each other until we have solid evidence of any suspicious behavior."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
